articles.title: US honors late Johnny Gaudreau and brother Matthew at Olympics
articles.description:
The U.S. team is paying tribute to the Gaudreau brothers in their locker room at the Milano Santagiulia Ice Hockey Arena.

The post US honors late Johnny Gaudreau and brother Matthew at Olympics appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: U.S. Olympic team honors late Johnny Gaudreau and brother Matthew at Milano Santagiulia Arena.
Tribute displayed in the locker room during the ongoing 2026 Winter Olympics.
Local residents celebrate the Gaudreau brothers' legacy in Boston's hockey community.

articles.title: A.J. Brown’s Eagles teammate doesn’t buy Patriots trade possibility
articles.description:
“That wink is all just fun and games.”

The post A.J. Brown’s Eagles teammate doesn’t buy Patriots trade possibility appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Eagles player dismisses rumors of A.J. Brown trade to the Patriots.
Brown's teammate stated the trade talk is just playful banter.
Boston fans remain uncertain about potential roster changes ahead of the season.
